short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intercepts mailto links and opens a Gmail compose window instead.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Sylectus SuperBid Chrome Extension – revolutionizing the way you bid on loads! Are you tired of the manual and time-consuming process of copying, pasting, and calculating every detail when bidding on Sylectus? Our extension streamlines this entire workflow with just one click. With a simple click on the broker’s name, the extension opens Google Maps, providing you with the origin, destination, and deadhead miles – all at once. Say goodbye to the hassle of manually entering truck dimensions and looking up mileage.

But that’s not all! The extension seamlessly integrates with your mail client, automating the bidding process. It populates the recipient field with the broker’s name, adds the load number to the subject line, and fills out the email body with details from the posting. And here’s the best part – customizable templates ensure that all the truck-specific information is effortlessly inserted into the email body. Now, all you need to do is enter your truck’s number and destination. Bid smarter, bid faster with the Sylectus SuperBid Chrome Extension – taking the stress out of load bidding and giving you more time on the road.
